about_the_game:
The war continues in this new chapter, you need to discover the mistery of the people infestation and face a new enemy.

This expansion includes new gameplay content.

Features.

-New game chapter with achievements

-Extra weapons and new enemies.

-New interesting background music.
detailed_description:
The war continues in this new chapter, you need to discover the mistery of the people infestation and face a new enemy.

This expansion includes new gameplay content.

Features.

-New game chapter with achievements

-Extra weapons and new enemies.

-New interesting background music.
name: Pain of War - Expansion Pack

package_groups.name: default
package_groups.title: Buy Pain of War - Expansion Pack

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows XP (SP3) or higher
  • Processor: Intel Core 2 Duo (Merom) 1.66GHz or equivalent
  • Graphics: Intel Graphics Media Accelerator 950 or equivalent
  • Storage: 500 MB available space
  • Sound Card: Soundcard compatible with DirectX 9.0c
  • Additional Notes: DirectPlay Legacy requiered
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS *: Windows 7 or higher
  • Processor: Intel Pentium 4 a 2.4 GHz o equivalente
  • Graphics: ATI Radeon X800 / NVIDIA GeForce 7600 / Intel HD Graphics 2000 or higher
  • Storage: 1 GB available space
  • Sound Card: Soundcard compatible with DirectX 9.0c
  • Additional Notes: DirectPlay Legacy requiered

short_description: The war continues in this new chapter, you need to discover the mistery of the people infestation.
